versos: (banquet) Luke 14:15 - "When one of those at the table with him heard this, he said to Jesus, 'Blessed is the one who will eat at the feast in the kingdom of God.'";;;

(gallows) Esther 5:14 - "Then said Zeresh his wife and all his friends unto him, Let a gallows be made of fifty cubits high, and to morrow speak thou unto the king that Mordecai may be hanged thereon: then go thou in merrily with the king unto the banquet. And the thing pleased Haman; and he caused the gallows to be made.";;;

(feasting) Isaiah 22:13 - "But look, there is joy and revelry, slaughtering of cattle and killing of sheep, eating of meat and drinking of wine 'Let us eat and drink,' you say, 'for tomorrow we die'";;;

(hedge) Job 1:10 - "Have you not put a hedge around him and his household and everything he has You have blessed the work of his hands, so that his flocks and herds are spread throughout the land.";;;
(retain) John 20:23: "If you forgive anyone's sins, their sins are forgiven; if you do not forgive them, they are not forgiven.";;;
(solitary) Psalm 68:6 - God sets the solitary in families; He brings out those who are bound into prosperity; but the rebellious dwell in a dry land.;
(prevent) 1 Thessalonians 4:15 - "For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep.";;;
(roaring) Psalm 104:21 - "The lions roar for their prey and seek their food from God.";;;

(axes) 1 Chronicles 20:3 - "And he brought out the people who were in it and set them to labor with saws and iron picks and iron axes and made them toil at the brick kilns. And thus he did to all the Ammonite cities. Then David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.";;;
(armour) Ephesians 6:11 - Put on the full armour of God
(mortal) Genesis 6:3 - "Then the LORD said, 'My Spirit will not contend with humans forever, for they are mortal; their days will be a hundred and twenty years.'";;;
(maker) Isaiah 54:5 - "For your maker is your husband-- the LORD Almighty is his name-- the Holy One of Israel is your Redeemer; he is called the God of all the earth.";;;
(moth) Matthew 6:19 - "Do not store up for yourselves treasures on earth, where moths and vermin destroy, and where thieves break in and steal.";;;
(devices) Proverbs 21:5 - "The plans of the diligent lead surely to abundance, but everyone who is hasty comes only to poverty.";;;
